casebody.data:
Merrimack County Probate Court

No. 7350 Seth Marshall v. Ernest Thalasinos November 30, 1976 Warren B. Rudman, attorney general, and Carroll F. Jones, Esquire (Mr. Jones orally), for the State and the plaintiff Marshall. Michael F. Chubrich (Mr. Chubrich orally) for the defendant.

*672Memorandum Opinion

The defendant died on or about September 2, 1976. Accordingly this case challenging the validity of his commitment is therefore moot and is dismissed.

Dismissed.
